Title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
Writer: Kevin DiCicco (character "Air Bud"), Paul Tamasy (characters), Aaron Mendelsohn (characters), Paul Tamasy, Aaron Mendelsohn
Actors: Tim Conway, Dick Martin, Kevin Zegers, Cynthia Stevenson
Plot: Now in the 8th Grade, Josh discovers he has a great throwing arm and tries out for his school football team. It is then soon discovered that his dog, Buddy, can also make impossible catches, and the two become an unstoppable force. However, an evil duo of Russian circus-managers attempt to kidnap Buddy and use him as their main attraction, while the Timberwolves make it to the championship. Can Josh save Buddy before the big game?
Production: Keystone Pictures, Dimension Films, Golden Receiver, Alliance Atlantis Communications, Canadian Government
